message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. This is a fair price considering its value to me, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I think your initial offer is a bit steep. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1800000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the initial price, but I'm still not willing to let it go for $1800000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $2100000. This is a fair compromise considering the value I place on the product.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make another counteroffer of $1900000. I think this is a fair price considering the value I believe the product will bring me.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1900000. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer it to you for $2050000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the value I place on the product.

I understand that you're not willing to budge much further, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make another counteroffer of $1850000. I think this is a fair price considering the value I believe the product will bring me, and I'm willing to compromise further if you're willing to meet me halfway.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I'm willing to listen to your proposal. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1850000. I'm willing to make another compromise and offer it to you for $2025000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value I place on the product.

I understand that you're willing to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make another counteroffer of $1800000. I think this is a fair price considering the value I believe the product will bring me, and I'm willing to meet you halfway if you're willing to consider it.
